input.sentences: never to early in the day to take a selfie !
grandma [male] on her 55th birthday | still looking young !
my friends [female] and [male] over to help me with my hair !
me looking like a boss with my new hair cut !
output.sentences: Today is national take a selfie day so Brad started the day with a "i just woke up" selfie.
Brad is better than most males when it comes to remembering  birthdays so he was sure to get a selfie with his grandma on her birhday.
Like a typical male Brad got a bit self consious about his receding hairline when he saw ths selfie with his friends.
After noticing something had to be done about his hair he went to his favorite female stylist and got a selfie of her shaving him.
Brad was feeling like a boss after his hair cut so he took one last selfie.
